comment: If you are willing to learn, and put in the effort to show it, you should have no problem.  She isn't very explicit on course outline, but will let you know what she expects on assignments

I think Carol is great - her glass gave me headaches but I definitely learned what I needed. She is quirky but that makes her fun. She wants her students to learn & she prepares you for what employers will expect. She does offer "gab labs" during weekends and nights if students are having trouble.

Didn't stick to the syllabus. Assigned projects that were way beyond an entry course. Never posted grades during the term. Required a final exam and final project, both of which were beyond the scope of an intro course. The final was riddled with errors. Received ZERO feedback during the term. Prof requires you to use visit three different sites.
This is the worst professor I met.
